[망설임 없이 악마 선택한 연준] 아니... [YEONJUN chose "Devel" without hesitation] Hey... 듣기 View video M2 : [FULL] TOMORROW X TOGETHER Welcome Back Show
나를 본다고 가달라고 했을 때 그 늦은 시간에 망설임 없이 와주셨겠지? When he said he will go see me, his mother wouldn't have hesitated about taking him? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 하이하이

vlive.korean: [망설임X] 제가 먼저 적으면 돼요? [Not hesitant] Do I write first? 듣기 View video NCT 127 : [퍼프아이돌] NCT 127 편 (PUFF IDOL : NCT 127) 부제 : 멤버들 춤추다 오열한.SSUL

examples.korean: She came right out with it without any hesitation. 발음듣기 그녀는 조금의 망설임도 없이 직설적으로 말했다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: She came right out with it without any hesitation. 발음

examples.korean: He'll take the opportunity without hesitation. 발음듣기 그 사람은 망설임 없이 그 기회를 잡을거야. Neungyule
examples.english: He'll take the opportunity without hesitation. 발음

examples.korean: A lot of us are worshiping money without compunction. 발음듣기 우리들 중 많은 사람들이 망설임 없이 돈을 숭배하고 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A lot of us are worshiping money without compunction. 발음

examples.korean: So far, South Korean moviegoers, as well as those throughout Asia and Europe, have shown little reservation about paying the high ticket price of 3-D movies. 발음듣기 지금까지 한국과 아시아, 유럽 지역의 관객들은 별 망설임 없이 돈을 더 내고 3D 영화를 관람해왔다. Neungyule
examples.english: So far, South Korean moviegoers, as well as those throughout Asia and Europe, have shown little reservation about paying the high ticket price of 3-D movies. 발음

examples.korean: If a car comes suddenly round the corner and you cannot make up your mind which way to jump, the car will hit you, particularly if the driver is suffering from a similar hesitation. 발음듣기 만약 어떤 차가 갑자기 길모퉁이에서 나타나고 당신은 어느 쪽으로 뛰어야 하는지를 결정하지 못했다면, 그 차는 당신을 칠 것이다. 특히 운전자가 똑같이 망설임을 겪고 있다면 말이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If a car comes suddenly round the corner and you cannot make up your mind which way to jump, the car will hit you, particularly if the driver is suffering from a similar hesitation. 발음
